title: Industrial robots - worldwide sales 2004 to 2018
summary: In general Sales in thousand units has rose over the Year.

Sales in thousand units is roughly constant from 2005 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, and finally slightly increasing from 2013 to 2016.
The line significantly increased by 61.0 from Year 2009 to 2010.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Sales in thousand units, about 294.0 was reported at Year 2016
Minimum Sales in thousand units about 60.0 was reached at Year 2009
